Summary: triangle lights flying slowly in Davis California
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving along Covell Blvd West bound about 1.5miles East of Wildhorse Golf Course. There's a large open field we were driving by and I saw white lights in a triangular formation outlining what appeared to be a dark triangular object. I don't remember exactly how many lights, but I want to say 4 lights per side, including the corners - all white. One light was blinking about once per second - I think recall the one blinking light to be the "leading" light. It appeared to be 15-20 yards wide and was about 150' to 200' in the air. It was about 200 yards from us. It seemed to be flying at about 10-20MPH. I thought it was a small plane, but then noticed the triangular formation which caught my attention. I rolled down my window as we were passing it in the opposite direction and could not hear a sound over the "driving wind". My wife saw it, but she was driving and we didn't really discuss it, nor did I reveal to her how peculiar I thought it was. If I were driving by myself, I would have pulled over, but I was only able to watch it for a little less than 2 minutes until houses eventually blocked my view of it. I don't mind MUFON contacting me by email if my event is of interest. I would like to know if anyone else in the area reported similar occurrences. Please don't post my name online.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Davis
There were no other sightings in Davis on or around January 14th 2011
